channel.title: kargihome & Company
channel.description: Address: 39 Bury New Road, Prestwich, Manchester, M25 9JY Telephone: 0161 798 8000

item.title: 5 Bedroom Semi-Detached, Prestwich £850,000.00
item.description: kargihome Estate Agents are delighted to offer for sale this five bedroomed, 3 bathroomed, period semi detached property offering an abundance of character throughout along with unbelievably spacious family accommodation over three floors plus a large basement.

item.title: 2 Bedroom Bungalow, Whitefield £280,000.00
item.description: kargihome & Co are delighted to offer to the market this detached two bedroom bungalow located on a quiet cul-de-sac offering easy access to local shops and transport links. The property is in need of updating but offers a great opportunity to create your perfect home. Internal viewing is vital.

item.title: 2 Bedroom Flat, Salford £150,000.00
item.description: kargihome & Co are delighted to bring to the market this 1st floor apartment situated in a popular development offering easy access for local shops, transport links and places of worship. The apartment is presented to a high standard having been recently renovated.

item.title: 3 Bedroom Semi-Detached, Manchester £295,000.00
item.description: kargihome & Co are happy to bring to the market this 3 bedroom semi detached house located in a popular residential area offering easy access to local shops, transport links, schools and places of worship. The property offers great potential for extension subject to the usual permissions.

item.title: 3 Bedroom Semi-Detached, Manchester £330,000.00
item.description: kargihome & Co are delighted to bring to the market this three bedroom semi detached house located on a sought after road in Sedgley Park, the property benefits from two separate reception rooms and off street parking for two vehicles. Local shops, schools and places of worship are in close by.

item.title: 1 Bedroom Studio, Salford £750.00
item.description: kargihome & Co are pleased to present this second floor studio flat, in a superb location. The studio has a kitchen/lounge area, bathroom with a bath and overhead shower.

item.title: 3 Bedroom Semi-Detached, Prestwich £280,000.00
item.description: kargihome & Co are happy to bring to the market this semi detached house located on a popular residential location offering easy access to local shops, schools, places of worship and transport links. The property would make a great family home and is offered with no chain.

item.title: 3 Bedroom Terrace, Prestwich £199,950.00
item.description: kargihome & Co are happy to offer to the market this Mid Terraced, Three bedroom house having two reception rooms, The property is available vacant or with a sitting tenant. Local shops, schools, transport links are all within close proximity.

item.title: 3 Bedroom Apartment, Salford £235,000.00
item.description: kargihome & Co are happy to bring to the market this 3rd Floor (lift assisted) apartment offering 3 bedrooms and in need of modernisation throughout. The property is within close proximity to local transport links, shops and places and worship.

item.title: 4 Bedroom Semi-Detached, Salford £500,000.00
item.description: kargihome & Co are delighted to offer this substantial, four bedroomed, semi detached property occupying a great position along sought after Leicester Road. Needing modernisation but offering great potential.

A great opportunity to create a true family home.

item.description: kargihome & Co are happy to bring to the market this three bedroom semi detached house offering great potential for extension (subject to the usual permissions) located within close proximity to local shops, schools, places of worship and transport links. item.title: 2 Bedroom Terrace, Darwen £575.00
item.description: kargihome homes are pleased to present this good sized two bedroom mid terraced home located on the edge of the Darwen with excellent access to local town amenities and moments from the travel network. Viewings highly recommended.

item.description: kargihome & Co are happy to bring to the market this detached family home, located in a prime residential location. The property benefits from four bedrooms (1 En Suite) along with three reception rooms. Local shops, schools and places of worship are all within easy access.

item.description: kargihome Estate Agents are pleased to offer this impressive and pleasantly situated detached family home with the benefit of four bedrooms, a garage plus driveway, gas central heating and double glazing.

item.description: kargihome & Co are pleased to bring to the market this second floor, one bedroom apartment located conveniently to Prestwich Village and benefiting from a residents only carpark. The property requires full renovation and is available to cash buyers only.

item.title: New Revamped Website
item.description: We are proud to announce that our newly revamped website has finally gone live. It is a lot more responsive and all of our properties are updated in real time. The new website also gives users the ability to leave us a google review and obtain an instant online valuation. The staff profiles have been updated and every member of staff can contacted directly via the website. We wish you a pleasant surfing experience!

item.title: End Of Year Celebrations
item.description:
kargihome`s Director and staff, celebrated another successful year at the Taam Grill & Deli restaurant in Prestwich. A good time was had by everyone and there were smiles all round.
Unfortunately, our longest standing member of staff; Denise Taylor was unable to attend, due to illness.
There was an emotional element to this year`s party, as it is Ivor Sternberg`s retirement year. Ivor is part of the furniture at kargihome and will be sorely missed by everyone.
We thank you all for your custom throughout the year and here`s to a prosperous 2018!

item.title: Mollie Staines Returns!
item.description: We`re delighted to announce the return of Mollie Staines to our Lettings team. Mollie worked at kargihome back in 2015 and was very popular amongst our Landlords. She took a break to go back to teaching but has realised that her true passion is in property management. Her new role will be Assistant Lettings Manager.

item.title: The Legend Has Retired
item.description: On Friday 29th June, we had a farewell party at kargihome for Ivor Sternberg, who has been active in the Prestwich property market for close to 30 years. Over 100 people popped in to pay their respects. Ivor has retired just before his 75th birthday. Ivor will be remembered fondly by his many friends and we will miss him here at kargihome. We wish Ivor and his wife Wendy a Happy and Healthy retirement.

item.title: New Valuer
item.description:
We are delighted to announce the arrival of Leah Garside, who will be a new Valuer in our established team.
Leah has been working locally in property sales for over 10 years. We spot talent when we see it and are delighted that Leah has joined our team!
Leah brings with her all the local experience, which, combined with her bubbly personality, will make her a big asset at kargihome.

item.title: LANDLORDS PROMOTION
item.description:
We have today launched our end of year offer, with a HUGE DISCOUNT on our Letting & Management fees.

We are even giving away a FREE gas safety certificate, for all sign-ups by 31st of December 2019.

Hurry whilst offer lasts!!

CALL US NOW ON 0161 798 8000

item.title: STAMP DUTY HOLIDAY!
item.description:
WELCOME NEWS FOR THE PROPERTY MARKET!! The chancellor has just announced that If you purchase a residential property between 8 July 2020 to 31 March 2021, you only start to pay SDLT on the amount that you pay for the property above £500,000. These rates apply whether you are buying your first home or have owned property before.

This is a timely boost for all property buyers, during uncertain times.

item.title: OUR MOST PRESTIGIOUS PROPERTY EVER!
item.description:
We are delighted to have won the instruction of the most prestigious property ever marketed by our branch. It is a truly magnificent, 6 bed detached property, situated in the sought after Ringley Park Whitefield.

In the words of our Director, Toli Yodaiken; "It is truly an honour for kargihome & Co. to have been appointed as the selling agents for this property and we are hoping that there is a buyer out there who will appreciate this property for it`s breathtaking views, quality fixtures & fittings and fabulous accommodation".

For more details, please check the listing on our website, which includes a full 3D virtual tour and drone footage.

item.title: New Staff Appointments & Website Headshots
item.description:
We are delighted to announce the return of Mollie Staines to kargihome in August. Mollie is now our Lettings Manager and has vast experience in property management.

We have also recently appointed Sissi Rose as a Sales & Lettings Executive. Sissi is tasked with conducting our sales progression and also assists with the property management.

We hope that with these appointments, we can continue offering an unparalleled service in all aspects of property sales, lettings and management.

Check our website for our new headshots.

https://www.kargihome/meet-the-team.htm
